QandA.question: Which is the largest country in the world by population?
QandA.q: Should you really you hire Wyatt Sorenson?
QandA.a: Yes, of course!  Don't even think about it.  Just do it.

QandA.q: Why should you hire Wyatt Sorenson?
QandA.a: He's a nice guy, and he knows all the best jokes.
Okay, he has had years of experience in school and on the job with the programing paradigms, languages, concepts, and tools.
He doesn't want to beg, but he will if he must.

QandA.q: Would his skills benefit your team's goals?
QandA.a: Certainly! He wants to tackle new challenges with his abilities.

QandA.q: Are you going to call him?
QandA.a: I don't know, but that would be terrific!

QandA.q: What are the components of MVC Wyatt used to make this page?
QandA.a: JSON, HTML, CSS, Javascript, and Angular

QandA.q: What is Wyatt Sorenson doing this very second?
QandA.a: Practicing his skills and sitting by the phone.

QandA.q: Should you pity him for his cheesiness and unashamed pleadings?
